title: 20080621GCN _ George Butler_The Secret Truth_Guest Alan Watt
description:
20080621GCN _ George Butler_The Secret Truth_Guest Alan Watt

JUNE 21, 2008 - 911 SPECIAL PROGRAM - We welcome Alan Watt, Alan  is a profound expert in the field of ideas, world systems and Para-Politics and truly a truth seeker. His site Cutting Through The Matrix has many impressive writings and ideas   - Cutting Through the Matrix  Alan&#039;s body of knowledge about occultism is very broad and from an early age he avoided the programming that most of us have been subjected to and as a result he sees to the heart of the dark beast, his world view is in depth, perceptive and when one first hears Alan speak in such terms about the New World Order, it can be upsetting. Hang in listeners for Alan truly has the best interests of all freedom, liberty loving humans at heart!

    In all ages, in all lands, there have been those who seek truth. This seeking is an individual&#039;s search for something more than self, and much more than the confines of this worldly system. It is the seeker, who understands there is more than what meets the eye, who is not afraid and makes the choice to go into the unknown. The process of awaking has begun, the discovery is underway.
    2008 - Alan Watt - A Course in Deprogramming
